Package converters

Interface BaseConverter

All Known Implementing Classes:
CentimetreConverter, DecametreConverter, DecimetreConverter, HectometreConverter, KilometreConverter, MetreConverter, MileConverter, MilimetreConverter, YardConverter
public interface BaseConverter
Interface that others converter classes will be based on.

    Methot that puts the value on the basic unit.
